overview: Pan is the VP of marketing at Vwink. He is a senior at the University of Southern California studying computer science, specifically in Human Computer Interaction. His interest has lead him to intern with NASA Kennedy Space center where he did research and development on a voice controlled augmented reality interface for the EVA space suit. His interest has also lead him to pursue many independent projects. From his achievements he has obtained the Goolge Lime, Boeing, and USC Trojan Guild of Los Angeles Alumni scholarships.
